name: Journal Nikki
description:
Oh dear... Ichitsuki is a boy with lemon-shaped hair who can't seem to leave his room for some reason, he just backs away from it. Poor kid, maybe his dreams will tell us what's wrong, in some strange cryptic way?

This game is a Yume Nikki Fangame created by Frannex Games. Programming was handled by me (Nexus0.10/Nex) and Frankie1205 did the more high-quality graphics. The game is in development, so graphics and ideas may change over time in future releases. You can see the changes over time already made by downloading older versions we have so kindly provided!

There are two types of collectibles in this fangame; effects and memories. Can you tell which type is good or bad?

You need the RPG Maker 2003 RTP to run this game. Get it here: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages
